message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $9,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to go up to $8,500?  I believe the value of this product will more than make up for the slight difference.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I'm still only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product.
